message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $95 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $105.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I am still working within my budget. Would it be possible for you to lower the price to $100?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and sell the product to you for $102.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget constraints, would it be possible for you to lower the price to $101?
I'm getting close to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more adjustment and sell the product to you for $103.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. Considering my budget, would it be possible for you to lower the price to $102?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $103 one last time. This is my final offer.
